EmailTemplate.subject: It was great to meet you at Cloud Foundry Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for stopping by the Pivotal booth at last week’s Cloud Foundry Summit.
Innovating is the new cost-cutting. We help companies like yours get better at planning, developing, and shipping software. With a proven portfolio <[[https://pivotal.io/products?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-cf-summit-switzerland-q417]]> of methodologies, a cloud-native platform, and open-source data and analytics software, we can help you transform the way you build and deliver software. Start your cloud-native journey with Pivotal and get to market faster!
Until we meet again, here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-summit-europe?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-cf-summit-switzerland-q417]]> are some resources to dig into.
You may also want to take advantage of some in-depth online resources to learn more about cloud-native patterns <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native ?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-cf-summit-switzerland-q417]]>, microservices architectures <[[https://pivotal.io/microservices ?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-cf-summit-switzerland-q417]]>, and Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry ?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-cf-summit-switzerland-q417]]>.
Now is the time to make software a core part of your business. Let’s build something meaningful together!
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
For more in depth presentations on cloud-native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-cf-summit-switzerland-q417]]>. The event takes place December 4 - 7, 2017 in San Francisco. Use the code below for $100 off registration!
